rv: exaggerated and also inappropriate in introduction
/* HD DVD / Blu-ray disc comparison */ Simplification, clarification. Ref [[BD-J]]

/* Digital rights management */ "Protect" is a loaded and ambiguous term. AACS prevents uses of the content other than that authorized by the AACS LA. Many of the banned uses would otherwise be legal.
/* HD DVD / Blu-ray disc comparison */ clarafication
they're a primary source, it's more accurate to note that they're claiming something than reporting it
/* HD DVD / Blu-ray disc comparison */ claim can seem like libelious, report is accurate as they reported it
/* HD DVD / Blu-ray disc comparison */ since the HD DVD group's report has never been conclusively proven to be accurate, I feel this word is more appropriate to convey this fact
/* Corporate and industry support */ grammar. Also, is it necessary to list every mom-and-pop film studio that releases HD DVD's?
/* Digital rights management */ they don't wish to "restrict access" to their content, they want to block ALL illicit access to their content
still true "early players" dont have this feature infact most players dont
